website_summaries.verdict: The 2019 LG Gram 14 2-in-1 laptop lives up to its pedigree, delivering awesome battery life and strong performance at a lighter weight than the competition.
pros: The LG Gram 14 2-in-1 laptop is an ultralight pen-enabled convertible with extraordinary battery life for its class
It has more ports and connections than other premium convertibles along with an active pen included for writing and drawing
cons: You might need some time to adjust to the keyboard layout
there's no holder or garage for the pen

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on the LG gram was a little over 11 hours when the computer was new, four months ago. It is now down to less than 7 hours of actual running time on a full charge. This is a great disappointment since the computer was advertised as having up to 21 hours on a single charge. Update as of August 14, 2020, about 9 months after purchase. The computer was sent back to LG for service, and after six weeks of waiting, it's now even more disappointing. The 7 hours of runtime has not changed., and may have even dropped further. Either they did nothing, or the computer inherently has this level performance.
customer_reviews.author: AL B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop at the right price this holiday
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing amazing screen, amazing battery life, decent speed. Gonna update the SSD to a faster Samsung m.2. The current one is fast, but not quite fast enough. I'll also be upgrading the ram because why not? Ugh coil whine :( noticed some coil whine when plugged in and under load. It is what it is.. laptop still runs like a champ
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Quick and light
customer_reviews.text: Love this 2-in -1! Free battery life is fantastic... I probably get a solid 15 hours of use of a charge (at least). I use this for Logos bible software (version 8) and it runs it without a easily. Boots up the program within 15 seconds, if you're familiar, you know how amazing that is. Solid specs, great performance and speed. Super light weight, less than 2.5 lbs!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not so much . . .
customer_reviews.text: I truly wanted to like this laptop, but the sound quality is horrible. I can barely hear it at 100%. For the price of this laptop, you'd think there would be exceptional sound quality but not so much. Sad to say, but my iPad sound is much better than this. Sorry LG, but I will be returning for a refund and trying some of your less expensive competitor models.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent convertible, just bogged down by slightly downgraded specs
customer_reviews.text: This would be the perfect laptop if the specs were just a bit better As it is it’s perfectly adequate for most tasks; and with the pen, lightness and sturdiness it’s hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as I expected. It bends, it's not heavy, the battery is OK; the colours are great, the view adaptable; it is a laptop, a tablet, a notepad. The stylus pen works also on the LG Q Stylus phone. It's really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Giammarco Tosi

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power in a light thin package. I've been using it for over a month and have not come close to battery running out. It is fast with a bright clear screen. Of course a lot of the experience is due to Windows 10 You have to like the OS. But the hardware handles everything with ease.
customer_reviews.author: mars21

customer_reviews.title: Lightning fast
customer_reviews.text: nice looking laptop and truly lightweight. Long battery 🔋 life. Nice touchscreen. In owning different types of computers LG Gram hit a home run. OUT OF THE PARK. It has a matching Pen.
customer_reviews.author: AndieM.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful laptop with heat issues
customer_reviews.text: I love the long battery life of this laptop unfortunately the laptop got excessively hot while using and even more so during charging. To the point of I was worried about touching it the wrong moment and burning my self.
customer_reviews.author: Karambir Kaur

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! . No pen in box. Box was damaged when I got it. No help from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Billy king

customer_reviews.title: super light
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. Nice size screen, very sensitive touch screen, and so light to carry
customer_reviews.author: MARY JANE RAINS

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for about 6 months and really enjoyed using it. It is so lightweight and portable. Excellent camera for all of the web conferencing I now have to do. Switch to tablet mode is smooth and handy for an awkward transition to teaching math online. Has been a lifesaver since the COVID shutdown.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery last long enough for a university day! - over 10 hours. Great lightweight laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sales

customer_reviews.title: Is comfortable to work with.
customer_reviews.text: I like the laptop. Knows more than I do. Is a challenge to learn more.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA TOTH

customer_reviews.title: Many issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Laptop is very lightweight -Keyboard is ok -Battery life is very good -2 in 1 is nice Cons: -Display issues happen frequently (see picture attached) rendering the laptop unusable. Have had to send it in for repair 2x already within the past 9 months. -Overheats very quickly, even with minimal applications -Speakers are very tinny sounding -No place to attach the pen Overall: Ok to use when not broken, very frustrating when it is broken. Would return it if I could, but when I tried to do so after the first time it broke 5 months after buying it, was told that it is out of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ni

customer_reviews.title: good but
customer_reviews.text: green line on screen one time + windows os error occured black screen
customer_reviews.author: kim

product_meta.title: LG Gram 14T990-U.AAS8U1, 14” 2-in-1 Ultra-Lightweight Laptop with Intel Core i7 Processor and Wacom Pen, Silver
product_meta.description: Style:2019 EditionUnbelievably lightweight, long-lasting, and practical, the 2-in-1 LG gram helps you redefine YOUR passion.
feature_bullets: 14.0 inch Full HD IPS LCD touchscreen
Converts to 14 tablet - includes Wacom AES 2.0 pen

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
